content: This has been again a strong quarter for AgileThought with revenue totaling $46.2 million, above our guidance, and representing a growth of 4.4% versus previous quarter and 18.6% year-over-year. This framework enables the sales team to not only provide industry expertise to our clients, but also provide a strong technology perspective based on our Guilds, and allows the delivery teams to continue building expertise on cutting edge technologies. Financial services continues to be our main industry vertical with 27% of our total revenues in the second quarter of 2022 followed by healthcare with 23.5%  of revenues of revenues, our fastest growing vertical with 47.4% year-over-year revenue growth and 8.2% sequential revenue. Our revenue per billable employee as of last fall month ended June 2022 was 79,000, compared to 71,000 as of the same period of the prior year, representing 11% year-over-year growth and 2% sequential growth versus the 77.5000 in the first quarter of 2022. These efforts along with our robust bookings over the last several quarters, recent revenue and margin growth trend, strong demand environment, and expected improvement in our employee hiring and retention should help us further accelerate our revenue and gross margin transposed 2022.
